name: TJ's CBD
description: TJ’s CBD is a high-CBD strain that is bred by TJ’s Organic Garden in Washington State. Its subtle and mellow flavor profile is led by a skunky aroma and produces a sense of calm physical relaxation without clouding the mind. This variety took the prize for Best High-CBD Flower at the 2015 Oregon DOPE Cup.
descriptionPlain: TJ’s CBD is a high-CBD strain that is bred by TJ’s Organic Garden in Washington State. Its subtle and mellow flavor profile is led by a skunky aroma and produces a sense of calm physical relaxation without clouding the mind. This variety took the prize for Best High-CBD Flower at the 2015 Oregon DOPE Cup.

highlightedReviews.text: This has been a godsend for my fibromyalgia pain. No head high, all body. Lovely.

I can't handle much THC, it makes me really sick to my stomach. This strain is low enough in THC that I can smoke as needed for my pain and it really does help. A serious godsend for my chronic illnesses. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

articles.title: The Oregon DOPE Cup Winning Cannabis Strains, Concentrates, and Edibles
articles.author: Will Hyde
articles.text:
October 1st marked the opening of recreational cannabis sales in Oregon, and what better way to close out the weekend of celebrations than with the first cannabis cup in the state? DOPE Magazine hosted the Oregon DOPE Cup at Refuge PDX in Portland. Happy Oregonians spilled out of the venue and into the city streets, eager to join the festivities and excitedly sampling all the vendors had to offer. The evening’s entertainment was provided by a variety of local musicians and artists who warmed the crowd up for Redman’s headlining performance.
Happy people, good music, and award-winning cannabis — what more could you ask for? How about the winning strains and products? Here are the award-winners from the 2015 Oregon DOPE Cup:
 
Winning Cannabis Flowers

 
Peoples’ Choice

Mango Kush from Chalice Farms
 
Judges’ Choice

GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) from Herbal Roots
 
Best Indica Cannabis Strain

Winner: Obama Kush from High Standards
Runner Up: Anonymous V from Eco Firma Farms
 
Best Sativa Cannabis Strain

Winner: Strawberry Ice from Chalice Farms
Runner Up: Chernobyl from Geek Farms
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Strain

Winner: Platinum Animal Cookies from Ideal Farms
Runner Up: Cherry Lopez from Dr. Vert
 
Best High-THC Cannabis Strain

Winner: The White from Eco Firma Farms
Runner Up: New York Old School from Five Mules Farms
 
Best High-CBD Cannabis Strain

Winner: TJ’s CBD from TJ’s Organics
Runner Up: Charlotte’s Web from Chalice Farms
 
Winning Cannabis Concentrates

 
Best BHO (THC)

Winner: OG Kush Live Resin from Dirty Arm Farm
Runner Up: Agent Orange Live Resin from Dirty Arm Farm
 
Best BHO (CBD)

Winner: Harle Tsu from Proper Oil
Runner Up: Harle Tsu from Mad Fama
 
Best PHO (THC)

Winner: Jack Herer Terp Wax from Orgone Extracts
Runner Up: White Super Skunk from Cultivated Industries
 
Best Non-Solvent Cannabis Concentrate (THC)

Winner: Pineapple Trainwreck Terp Sauce from Primo Extracts
Runner Up: Animal Cookies from Reson Ranchers
 
Best Cannabis Concentrate Cartridge

Winner: OG Kush Wax Truly Pure
Runner Up: Dutch Treat from Golden XTRX
 
Best CO2 Cannabis Concentrate (THC)
Winner: Smarties OM Extracts
Runner Up: The Clear from Orgone Extracts
 
Best CO2 Cannabis Concentrate (CBD)
Winner: Buddha Kong from True North Extracts
Runner Up: Harle Tsu from OM Extracts
 
Winning Cannabis Edibles

 
Best Sweet Cannabis Edible
Winner: Chocolate Kettle Corn from Cannavore
Runner Up: Blueberries and Hazelnut from Blaze Bars
 
Best Savory Cannabis Edible
Winner: Garlic Herb Almonds from Lunchbox Alchemy
Runner Up: Ginger Hemp Granola from Pannacea Valley Gourmet Edibles
 
Best CBD Cannabis Edible
Winner: Honey Bee Honey Stick from Echo Electuary
Runner Up: CBD Dark Chocolate Truffle from Leif Medicinals
 
Best Cannabis-Infused Drink
Winner: Mate Karate from Bent Beverage
Runner Up: Fruit Punch Level 3 from Vitonic
 
Winning Cannabis Topical

 
Best Cannabis Topical
Winner: Peppermint Cayenne Salve from Henrys Herbals
Runner Up: The Transdermal Patches from Synergy Skin Worx
